articles.author: ABP News Bureau
articles.title: Europe's 1,360-Kg Satellite ‘Aeolus’ To Fall Through Earth's Atmosphere, ESA Aims At Safe Landing - ABP Live
articles.description: ESA aims to lower Aeolus in a way such that it falls into the ocean, which will keep the chances of its fragments harming living beings on Earth's surface low.
articles.content: A 1,360-kilogram satellite is set to fall through Earth's atmosphere and may crash on the planet soon. The satellite, called Aeolus, is a European Space Agency (ESA) spacecraft which was launched in … [+3006 chars]
